comments.body: I think you're referring to the copper membership[1] which you can find here[2]Or by going to MORE (near the logout button) -> Buy copper membership).After that, you just need to upload the image somewhere and post the link between img tags, like this:Code:[img]http://IMG_URL.jpg[/img][1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote
